channel.title: Posts on rushad's dataVerse
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on rushad's dataVerse

item.title: Have fun with World Justice Project data
item.description: Today (March 2, 2018) I have seen the following the news on the Daily Star, the leading news paper in Bangladesh on Bangladesh being close to bottom in South Asia. I went to World Justice Project and downloaded the data from their project page.

item.title: ggrepel Demo
item.description: ggrepel has come to the picture to solve the problem of overlapping text. I thing it is pretty useful. let’s first load the library library(tidyverse) ## Loading tidyverse: ggplot2 ## Loading tidyverse: tibble ## Loading tidyverse: tidyr ## Loading tidyverse: readr ## Loading tidyverse: purrr ## Loading tidyverse: dplyr ## Conflicts with tidy packages ---------------------------------------------- ## filter(): dplyr, stats ## lag(): dplyr, stats library(ggrepel) Let’s create the data first

item.title: ARI Data Analysis
item.description: Bangladesh government banned all types three wheelers in 22 national highways effective from last August 1, 2015. It was surely a drastic measure to curb the fatalities in road accidents that has taken epidemic proportion recently in Bangladesh.

item.title: Cuba and Castro's legacy
item.description: There have been lots of dicussion and debate on social media on the legacy of Fidel Castro since his death on November 25, 2016. Major focus was on Cuba’s exemplary achievement in health indicators during Castro’s regime.
